page.title: 10Linceter Today(Brockhampton
page.content: Linceter Farm was built about 1839 it is a brick house witha slate roof and is built on an old foundation situated on Badley Wood Common.My Great Grandfather came aa a tenant to Linceter Farm in 1903. Many changes have taken place since those days,such as combining in stead of threshing,silaging in place of hay making,potatoe harvester for harvest- ing potatoes,hedge trimmer instead of hedge bills. My Father sells his animals in Worcester and Hereford market and usually buys them from the same market. Most groceries Mum buys in Bromyard but clothes and and household goods she buys in Kidderminster,she stores much of this food in the freezer. I travel to school by bus,Mum takes me to the bus stop by car.
